channel.title: Another question about putting a folder and transfering it to mediafire
channel.description: well i have another server that i want to start and when i uploaded everything to mediafire. i cant put it into a folder. please tell me how to get all my files into a folder so people can dl client. thank you

item.title: Another question about putting a folder and transfering it to mediafire
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

right click the folder
select send to
select compressed
wait for winRAR to compress it
upload the RAR file

Read full topic
item.source: Another question about putting a folder and transfering it to mediafire
